message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. I can do a bit better than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $160?
Hi Alice, thanks for the counteroffer! I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate that! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $155. Is that a deal you'd be comfortable with?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $145 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
